page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN PENROSE
page.content: {PENROSE}was the first stop, there we found three people who were employed. Their jobs were:an Architect, a Postman and Store manager. Mrs Miller of Treburrick was the first employed person that I met.She is employed by the local strawberry farm.Her husband is employed by E.C.L.P. Mrs.Miller's next-door neighbour's husband is a Quantity Surveyor.Then I bumped into an ex-Railway man who couldn't tell us much.Then I met a Milkman who works for Richards Dairies.There appear to be more RAF children than Farmer's children.Here are four other types of job:an U.S.Pilot, a Vet and a Film star and a Newsagent owner.At Porthcothan there are two Life guards.Both work on bad days.The times they work from are 10.00-18.00 and from May to September.
